GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /users/:username.description: serves an object of a single user

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of a single article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: serves an object of the new comment

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics
